newsitem.title: USA: FINAL PRICING - Needles Pub Util Auth, Calif..
newsitem.headline: FINAL PRICING - Needles Pub Util Auth, Calif..

text.p: O'Connor & Company Securities said it received the written award for the $21.145 million of Needles Public Utility Authority, Calif., utility system acquisition project revenue bonds, 1997 Series A, with a top yield of 6.85 percent in 2032.
